remarks: An element of a structure power is a function from the index set to the base set of the structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwsbas.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsbas.f $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwselbas.v $e |- V = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwselbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
pwselbas.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. Z ) $.
pwselbas.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
pwselbas $p |- ( ph -> X : I --> B ) $.
